channel.title: Help Me!
channel.description:
ok i need a few things 1. i need the global object code 2. i need the code that alows u to morph 3. i need to now how to place npcs and make them say if ur on or not 4. i need to now how to edit shops so they only have what i want in them 5. how to edit prices in shops 6. how to make people have unlimited hp
if u know any of this can u plz help me and also if u no the codes then could u please tell me where to put them
ty :|

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

ok i need a few things

  1. i need the global object code - Seach for newObject in client.java
  2. i need the code that alows u to morph. Here is code :

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }
3. i need to now how to place npcs and make them say if ur on or not: , add this into npc hander, to find where. just search for something that another npc sais. and after the last } add this :

else if (npcs[i].npcType == npcid) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("playername")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "playernamel is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "playername Is Offline!"; } } }
4. i need to now how to edit shops so they only have what i want in them, Shops.cfg
5. how to edit prices in shops Shops.cfg
6. how to make people have unlimited hp- Log out and change charecterskill 3 to 99999

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @x_o_pked_o_x x_o_pked_o_x
item.description:
@x_o_pked_o_x wrote:

  1. i need the global object code- I don’t know, sorry.
  2. i need the code that alows u to morph- Firstly, get the NPC ID, (help, NPC Id, Search, the code to the right). Now do ::pnpc #. # Is the NPC ID
  3. i need to now how to place npcs and make them say if ur on or not- I don’t know, sorry.
  4. i need to now how to edit shops so they only have what i want in them- Shops.cfg I think, find the shop and find the stuff.
  5. how to edit prices in shops- Item.cfg, find the item.
  6. how to make people have unlimited hp- Go to charecters(on top of files) and find the char name, right-click and edit. Ctrl+F and search for “character-skill = 3” and change the next number to 9999999, this should unlimit HP!

Read full topic
